doc.name: words
doc.summary: Used with the sort command, number function, and is among and is not among properties to designate space-delimited or quoted parts of a string. Also used with the find command to search for one or more entire words.

examples.example: put (field 2 is among the words of field 1) into spellcheckMe
find words "run" -- finds "run", but not "running" or "grunt"

description.p: Use the words keyword to sort or select individual words.
A word is a set of characters enclosed by spaces, tabs, or returns.
When used with the find command, the words keyword finds cards that contain each of the specified words, though not necessarily next to each other.
